title: â˜… Shortlisted jobs
description:
You can set Profile Preference on your CV to prevent Employer(s) from seeing it in the Bdjobs CV Bank.
- To show your profile to all Employer(s) select Public.
- To restrict seeing your profile select Private or Limited.
Also you can set your Availability for the next job on your profile for the employers while applying.
- Select Yes if you can join immediately on the next applicable job.
- Select No if you can not join immediately on the next applicable job.
